The environment lends itself to learning, development and an internationally designed curriculum. Sports Indus intl school has an very good variety of sports. Classrooms are spaciously designed to seat 25 students, and are equipped with play areas for pre-school, projection systems, computer facilities and lockers. The integrated sports complex comprises an indoor stadium and an outdoor track and field stadium. The well-equipped amphitheatre has a seating capacity of over 1000.
There are separate boys and girls hostels based on the 'house' concept. Each hostel is closely supervised by an experienced houseparent.
